attributes.additional_details:
Politicans today are debating about holding a referendum, they will give us a choice of in or out. However, I think that there should be more options.

I think having anothr choice of "in" if the contract is re-negotiated so the UK can:

- Set our own laws
- Negotiate with non-European countries
- Westminster can have a veto to over rule if it is not in British interest

In and out can not possibly be the only options for voting.
